lines.text: Meet my most valuable client, Johnny Tyronne. He is an American, which means nothing, but he is filthy rich, which most assuredly means something.

[Referring to the children that Sinan threatens to kill if Johnny does not assassinate the King]
How can I be sure they won't be harmed?
Assassinate King Toranshah and you have Sinan's promise that no harm will come to them. In over one thousand years, no leader of the assassins has ever violated a promise.
Well it's nice to know you're doing business with such a reputable firm.
I like the way you settle your scores, your Majesty.
I couldn't kill my own brother, Johnny. But I am sending him into exile, with his favorite chess player
Just be a nice king and don't exile him into the USA.
I am Sinan, Mr. Tyronne, Lord of the Assassins.
Well, I'm the Sheik of Araby. Whatta ya want with me anyway?
It's like the choice in an election year.
